requests.name: Electric Water Heater - With Installation
requests.description:
Family of 3. 

Father has been working all these while since last year, low income (1.2k). Mother has been working previously as well, but returned to India with the children in 2019, and was stuck there due to covid-19. The mother and child just returned from India to SG mid last year, when the travel lanes started. 

However unfortunately, the father was diagnosed with spinal conditions, that are degenerative in nature in late 2021. Hence, he is also not able to return to his previous job as a admin staff due to difficulty to type.  He has been hospitalised and is currently still undergoing therapy for rehabilitation. Hospital mentioned that the whole rehab period takes 6 months, and he will need to be retrained to take on new job meanwhile due to the new disability present. Mother has to take care of him in the meantime and will not be able to work. The son is in his teens.

Family is currently on Comcare financial assistance.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Quek Liu Ting

requests.name: 3 Wall Fans (Includes installation)
requests.description:
Family lives in public rental flat and have 1 pri school child and a 8-month-old baby. 
The house is crowded and stuffy. 
Father is the sole breadwinner doing food deliveries and mother is a home maker. 
Client is requesting for 3 wall fans to circulate the air at home.
Thank you.

Requesting halal food rations and household items for needy families who may not have money to buy food and household items due to financial issues

Rice - 5kg x 10 
Instant Noodle - Packet - 20 packets / Cup - 20 cups
Halal canned food - 20 cans
Spaghetti sauce - 15 bottles / Pasta (Eg: Spaghetti) - 500g x 15
Milo (sachet) - 15/pack x 10
Biscuit (assorted) - 20 packets / Cereal - 10 boxes

Shampoo x 10 / Soap x 10
(Toothbrush – 5 pack) x 10 / Toothpaste - 10

requests.name: Similac Step 4 x 1 bottle
requests.description: Client works part time as a school canteen staff and has multiple dependents at home. She has difficulty meeting the milk powder needs of two young nephew who is currently under her care.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way
contact.name: Joycelyn Wong

requests.name: 3 packets of drypers/huggies XXXL (pull up pants
requests.description:
Client works part time as a school canteen staff and has multiple dependents at home. She has difficulty meeting the diaper needs of elderly mother and 2 young nephews (2 & 4 years old). 

She requires 3 packets of TENA M size (pull up pants), 3 packets of huggies/drypers XL(pull up pants), and 3 packets of drypers/huggies XXL (pull up pants. 

Please respond via email or whatsapp @ 66901010

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way
contact.name: Joycelyn Wong

requests.name: Wheelchair
requests.description:
Mr S is an elderly client known to Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC). He was recently admitted to the hospital due to a fall at home. He will be discharged soon this week.
  
THKMC is looking for self-wheeling manual wheelchair to ensure Mr S’s mobility as he likes to commute out every day.
   
If you know of someone who has the items for donation, please contact case worker Anthony at 9654 6542 or email: anthony.wang@thkmc.org.sg. 
    
Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services.    
   
THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.

contact.org: THK Cluster Support @ Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Anthony Wang

requests.name: Commode
requests.description:
Mr Idris is an elderly client known to Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC). Mr Idris is an unemployed senior who lives alone and has limited mobility, leading to possible fall risks at home and especially in the bathroom. He rarely receives visits from his children and depends on himself despite his old age. Mr Idris cooks, cleans and buys food and groceries for himself but has suffered numerous falls over the past year. 
  
THKMC is looking for a commode with pot and cover on wheels (detachable) to ensure safety as he is alone at home most days when he is showering or using the toilet.
   
If you know of someone who has the items for donation, please contact caseworker Danial Shamsudin @ 92310458.
    
Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services.    
   
THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.

requests.name: Motorised Wheelchair
requests.description: Family of 3 living in a 2 room rental flat. Client unable to work at the moment as he is undergoing therapy for his medical condition. Wife is main caregiver of him and 7 year old young child. She is currently exploring employment to help supplement family's financial needs. The wheelchair will help to offset some financial costs from the family as it lessens cost of transportation. For further liaison of delivery information, please contact Nurul at 98598767 via whatsapp. Thank you.

requests.name: Motorised Wheelchair
requests.description:
Elderly client and her husband live together, no children, no income. Client is a caregiver to her husband who attends dementia daycare from Mon-Fri. Client usually stays home due to poor mobility and uses wheelchair when she goes out. Husband's PG controller of his motorized wheelchair is damaged and they're unable to afford repairs. 

Please contact Sarah at 97232082, or email sarahseetow@mws.sg

contact.org: MWS Active Ageing Centre - Kebun Baru
contact.name: Sarah Seetow

requests.name: Wheelchair
requests.description: Widowed father with 2 young children needs a size 24 wheelchair. Father has multiple medical condition (heart, high blood pressure, kidney issue etc) and is unable to work. His current wheelchair has broken down and needs extensive repairs.

requests.name: Electric Wheelchair
requests.description: Elderly person with no income recently discharged from hospital and is unable to walk independently. Hopes to receive a motorised wheelchair in order to assist him in ADL such as going out to buy groceries etc.

requests.name: Ramp
requests.description: Client is terminally ill and requires ramp for his toilet so commode can be pushed into toilet for showering/toileting.  Client is deteriorating and is having troubles ambulating and going to the toilet on his own. Patient is foreigner and hence does not qualify for any government grants, family would benefit from in-kind support to alleviate their financial burdens for patient's medical related expenses. Kindly contact me at 84282545.

requests.name: Personal Mobility Aid
requests.description:
Mr Seah is an elderly client known to Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC). During his younger years, he fell from a tree and injured his spine. Since then, Mr Seah has been wheelchair bounded and as he lives alone, he relies on the PMA for his daily commute for food and groceries. Recently, his PMA started breaking down, with the battery’s lifespan going extremely short. He faces the risk of being stuck outside when the PMA suddenly runs out of power.
  
THKMC is looking for a new/used motorized Personal Mobility Aid (PMA) for Mr Seah to continue independence and mobility in the community.
   
If you know of someone who has the items for donation, please contact case worker Anthony at 96546542 or email: anthony.wang@thkmc.org.sg.   
    
Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services.    
   
THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.

contact.org: THK Cluster Support @ Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Anthony Wang

requests.name: Rollator Walker
requests.description: Please WhatsApp Odelia at 8588 3163 during office hours or email to Odelia.Teo@THKMC.ORG.SG to liaise. Client is in her 50s. She had completely lost her eyesight in her right eye and is partially blind in her left eye. She also has mobility issues and is unable to walk for long without feeling fatigue and pain. She depends on the rollator walker to her rover around the community, but her current device is suffering from wear and tear. Due to her health condition, client is unable to work and hence has limited financial resources. She does not receive support from her family as well. Would greatly appreciate a donation of a rollator walker with a storage compartment that is in good condition.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Navarraj

requests.name: Battery: 2PK 12V 55AH
requests.description: Please WhatsApp Debera at 8855 3078 during office hours or email to deberatan@thkmc.org.sg to liaise. Client is a single mother to three children aged 11, 12 and 20. Client has diabetes and chronic asthma which causes her to be unable to work. Client's 20-year-old daughter works to support the family. Client relies greatly on a Personal Mobility Aid (PMA) to move around as she has persistent giddiness and propensity to faint. Any form of injury to her body arising from a fall may potentially be life-threatening. Currently, she already has a PMA but needs battery replacement as current one is going very slow and might spoil soon.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Navarraj

requests.name: Laptop
requests.description: Mother from low-income family with young children under 2 years old hopes to have a secondhand laptop to take online courses to upgrade herself.

requests.name: Laptop
requests.description: Client is a single mother who just got released from her prison sentence in January 2021. Her eldest son, 18 is recently on Boys Home leave as he has gotten the approval to resume his ITE education. Although she currently works two jobs to make ends meet, they are largely ad-hoc / part time in nature. Having this laptop would be a timely assistance for the son to resume his HBL without having to constantly shuttle back and forth school and home. Interested donors kindly contact Alexis at 6365 8751. Thank you.
requests.specifications: Webcam included , Functional microphone , Microsoft Office installed

requests.name: Laptop
requests.description: Hello there, I am looking for a laptop in good and useable condition for a low-income family. It is a learning aid for a child.Thanks in advance.

requests.name: Laptop
requests.description: Single mother with 2 school going sons. Mother just started temporary packing job after being unemployed for abt a year due to her health conditions and was on SSO assistance previously. Her older son who just entered ITE needs a working laptop with his current lessons and assignments urgently as he needs to return his existing loaned laptop from his previous secondary school.

requests.name: laptop
requests.description: Laptop will be helpful for client to bridge the digital divide between him and his classmate. Laptop will also assist him in his schoolwork for his tertiary education.

requests.name: Laptop
requests.description: Female Client, 62 yo diagnosed with  Lymphoma Cancer staying with her 2 school-going children age 14yo & 17yo. She  requires a working laptop to help with their school work and HBL if needed. She is not working & her husband has passed away due to cancer too on 2008.

requests.name: Laptop
requests.description: Client is currently unemployed and is faced with financial issues. She is on SSO Comcare assistance and is in need of a laptop so that she can work from home as the previous laptop she has is spoilt. Interested donors kindly contact janetlim@carecorner.org.sg. Thank you.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Admiralty
contact.name: Juanna Sia

requests.name: Metal Stove
requests.description: Family of 5 living in a 2-room rental flat is requesting for a metal stove with 2 stoves. Thank you very much.

requests.name: PUB Gas stove (NOT LPG) (NEED PUB) - With installation
requests.description:
SUGGESTED:  https://www.lazada.sg/products/local-seller-aerogaz-az-983sf-lpg-pub-double-table-top-burner-2-days-delivery-i1946877577-s10832709920.html?


Family of 3. 
Father has been working all these while since last year, low income (1.2k). Mother has been working previously as well, but returned to India with the children in 2019, and was stuck there due to covid-19. The mother and child just returned from India to SG mid last year, when the travel lanes started. 

However unfortunately, the father was diagnosed with spinal conditions, that are degenerative in nature in late 2021. Hence, he is also not able to return to his previous job as a admin staff due to difficulty to type.  He has been hospitalised and is currently still undergoing therapy for rehabilitation. Hospital mentioned that the whole rehab period takes 6 months, and he will need to be retrained to take on new job meanwhile due to the new disability present. Mother has to take care of him in the meantime and will not be able to work. The son is in his teens.

Family is currently on Comcare financial assistance.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Quek Liu Ting

requests.name: Double Gas Stoves
requests.description:
Our client is experiencing homelessness and was residing at a S3P shelter for the past 6-7 months. 
He has received his keys for his rental flat in Dec 2021. 
However, due to the financial situation (i.e. getting a new full-time job with the new housing stability), he would require support for basic household items to support his family's shift into the new rental flat.
Thank you.
